previewArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps 2, LA Galaxy 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: An early-season benchmark in the Western Conference pecking order could be ahead when Vancouver Whitecaps FC play host to the LA Galaxy on Saturday afternoon at BC Place.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Vancouver Whitecaps v LA Galaxy | April 4, 2015

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Nikki
timelineItems.text: @mariehui glad to have you back! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps supporters chanting "You fat bastard" to Jaime Penedo. Who I believe has about 8% body fat. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Pedro Morales does a nice spin but his shot is saved

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 10 MIN the crowd with a generous round of applause after Mezquida tracks back to pick Keane's pocket. Well played lad. #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Nicolás Mezquida.

timelineItems.name: Tyler Stychyshyn
timelineItems.text: Glad to be back at a game. #VWFC #MLS #whitecapsfc #vanvla #bcplace  #vancouver #vancity #bc #britishcolumbia #canada #vancouver #soccer #football #majorleaguesoccer  #footy

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Great chance by Pedro. Great build up in play. Couldn't get a clean strike #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Nicolás Mezquida following a fast break.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps FC
timelineItems.text: Scarves up! #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 14' SIDE NETTING. Rivero gets another chance but he fires his shot just wide of Penedo. He's been very dangerous early. #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mika Väyrynen (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: Vancouver’s sharper, faster, and better at closing down passing lanes. Settle in, folks. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Eighty Six Forever
timelineItems.text: #LAG seems content to sit back and soak up anything #vwfc throw at them

timelineItems.name: Aaron J.
timelineItems.text: 4.4.15 - #VWFC vs. LA Galaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Robbie Keane.
Foul by Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.text: First #Vancouver #Whitecaps game. Go 'Caps #vwfc #vancouverlife #soccer #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Match ends, Vancouver Whitecaps FC 2, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: Goals from Manneh & Rivero lift impressive @WhitecapsFC over @LAGalaxy --> http://t.co/3Piof61FUF #VANvLA http://t.co/Mdhkq9rfp6

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: I’d love to hear LA’s pass completion tonight. It’s got to be near all-time low. #VANvLA
Whitecaps outclassed LA from start to finish. Haven’t seen that before ever. 12pts in 5 matches & best in the west pending PDX finish #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Ryan
timelineItems.text: Absolutely incredible game!!! @WhitecapsFC with the big win and now first place in @MLS #VWFC http://t.co/wJoQOp2RsB

timelineItems.desc: An early-season benchmark in the Western Conference pecking order could be ahead when Vancouver Whitecaps FC play host to the LA Galaxy on Saturday afternoon at BC Place.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. LA Galaxy | April 4, 2015

timelineItems.name: El Padrino
timelineItems.text: There's no offensive creativity or possession from the #LAGalaxy tonight. Why keep playing Husidic out wide?

timelineItems.name: AFTN
timelineItems.text: Early thoughts from #VANvLA. Caps failing to look up for correct final pass. Beitashour not making runs. Sam giving DeLaGarza too much room

timelineItems.name: AFTN
timelineItems.text: Beitashour's positioning has been poor so far. Doesn't make runs when he should be, then out of position when he shouldn't be. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: good opening 20 mins. for #VWFC - Keane/Zardes haven't threatened much so far + Manneh & Co. look lively on left flank #VANvLA #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Kekuta Manneh blasts a shot just high and wide

timelineItems.name: Danielle
timelineItems.text: Wow. Teilbert's hair is even weirder than Gyasi's and that's saying something. #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: It is impressive how patient @LAGalaxy are to weather games, then strike when the time comes... #VANvLA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: #VWFC defensive solidity helped big time from 2 holding mids in front of back 4 - Laba/Teibert or Koffie superb - #HintHintTFC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Baggio Husidic (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 25' - Keane & Zardes still to get into the game. A bit strange their teammates are trying to find them with the direct ball... #VANvLA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Joey's Junk Removal ð
timelineItems.text: Finished a short work day and catching the #Vancouver #Whitecaps vs. #LA #Galaxy. Have a great long weekend and Happy Easter ð° #VanCity #BCPlace #MLS #WhitecapsFC #Adidas #VWFC #YVR #soccer #photooftheday #igers #amazing #sport
Yes. So close. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Dean Tsatouhas
timelineItems.text: Take the pitch. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps FC
timelineItems.text: Russell Teibert gets set to go for tonight's match vs. LA Galaxy. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Randip Janda
timelineItems.text: Manneh finding space just outside of the 18 yard box....he's got to test the keeper on one of those. #MLS #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: Dunivant has looked rusty. If Rogers is a coaches decision, it's a poor one as the Galaxy attack will be entirely right-sided #VANvLA.

timelineItems.name: Marie Hui
timelineItems.text: 4 game winning streak, sold out game, long weekend. What could be better? @WhitecapsFC #VWFC #GoCaps!

timelineItems.name: David Arnott
timelineItems.text: #whitecapsfc warmup before #lagalaxy match

timelineItems.name: brendan hannan
timelineItems.text: Look for Ishizaki and Vayrynen to be the most comfortable on turf. Both Scandinavians with a long history of playing on turf. #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps FC. Raúl Octavio Rivero tries a through ball, but Nicolás Mezquida is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Howard Chang
timelineItems.text: MLS Game! #Vancouver #WhiteCaps vs. #LAGalaxy yay

timelineItems.name: James Campbell
timelineItems.text: Getting warmed up for a classic #VWFC  #VWFCvsLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 30' Tommy Meyer goes down in a heap after apparently getting hit in the face with the ball. He's still down. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 😍😍😍 ‘dat #BlueOnBlue http://t.co/cri09FLtG0

timelineItems.name: de Coucy, von SaarbrÃ¼cken
timelineItems.text: #VWFC @ #themarch to#bcplace with #myboys @raincitybrigade #raincitybrigademarch to the #whitecaps game

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Tommy Meyer has some thick hair. Totally jealous. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Mika Väyrynen (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).

timelineItems.name: Har Journalist
timelineItems.text: #WhitecapsFC vs #LAGalaxy moments away from kickoff here @BCPlace. #MLS #VANvLA http://t.co/IbyPF2wdIj

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Lace 'em up, boys. It's time for #VANvLA: http://t.co/PpuqKxsnFl (via @WhitecapsFC) http://t.co/Sdn88itlNL

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text:
And weâre off in British Columbia! 
Watch #VANvLA live on @TWCSportsNet RIGHT THIS MOMENT!

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Omar thinks he's a striker. Always has. He will try to dribble through more ppl and pull himself out of position. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: This is crazy. Everyone is playing someone else's position. It's like total football's incompetent cousin. #VanvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Russell Teibert has covered every blade of turf in the opening 30 minutes. Relentless. #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy).
Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Eighty Six Forever
timelineItems.text: Paging Kendall Waston. FK in a dangerous spot for #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Buck Hammerstrong
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy looking sharp in the Blue on Blue, but their play is anything but

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 36' Yikes. Vancouver all over the #LAGalaxy on the free kick, but they can't register a shot after some sustained possession.

timelineItems.name: neil ochotorena
timelineItems.text: Keane and Zardes are just lost without a midfielder to connect to them. #ThanksLD #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Mika Väyrynen (LA Galaxy) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: much better #VWFC display vs. #LAGalaxy than vs. #Timbers - only the goals are missing but Robbo's gotta be much happier #VANvLA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 4 MIN Pedro with a moment of magic that gets the fans on their feet. The maestro looks up for this one tonight... #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Mark Robins
timelineItems.text: The two women behind us at the whitecaps game. They know all the chants, the players and still have time to admire each other’s hair. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Vayrynen looks like he's a victim of a crappy surface. That's too bad. Playing on fuzzy concrete will do that. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Pa Modou Kah (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Pa Modou Kah tries to slow down the LA attack

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Brutal give away by Kah. Deserves the yellow card. Season of silly fouls continue #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Derek Rawlings
timelineItems.text: Rodriguez can't get back fast enough. #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Cristian Nyari
timelineItems.text: Rivero works the channels well and brings other players into the game intelligently. Fun to watch. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Great challenge by Adekugbe goes to waste with horrible touch by Morales #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Greg
timelineItems.text: #VWFC trying way too much 1 on 1 attacking, it's not working. Need more numbers up front on rushes.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Steven Beitashour.

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane throws his arm up in the air as if to say, "If you play it quickly, I can receive the ball." #MLS #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Paul Wilson
timelineItems.text: I can tell everything that ishizaki is trying to do and that's why it's so frustrating when it never comes off. #VANvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: The Orange Futbol
timelineItems.text: Rodgers playing forward! Just as I've been suggesting. He doesn't need to be restrained to defense. #VANvLA #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps FC 0, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HT: A quick tempo, but no score in Vancouver --> http://t.co/NoKmeJhzrg (via mairecost on Instagram) #VANvLA http://t.co/74GopTv0qb

timelineItems.name: FTBL Podcast
timelineItems.text: Best 45 minutes of the season? Me thinks so! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: HT VAN 0 - LA 0: Vancouver posed more of a threat in opening half. Galaxy holding firm, though. #MLS #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Eighty Six Forever
timelineItems.text: very encouraging to see the Caps not being dominated by LA like we've seen so many times. Should be an interesting 2nd half #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Kasey Hunter
timelineItems.text: Time for Flores and Earnshaw. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Michael Chapman
timelineItems.text: Let's go, White Caps! Let's go! #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Andrew Cupples
timelineItems.text: Its gameday! #vwfc #whitecapsfc #blue #white #southsiders #raincity #whitecaps #caps #bc #canada #vancouver

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Vancouver Whitecaps FC 0, LA Galaxy 0.
Attempt blocked. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by A.J. DeLaGarza.

timelineItems.name: Oz Sweeney
timelineItems.text: The Aussies first game! #VWFC #Blue&White #OogyOogyOogy @brooklleee @whitecapsfc

timelineItems.name: Nelson Jr.
timelineItems.text: 2nd Half #VANvLA http://t.co/c75NOKCKz5

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Juninho (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.

timelineItems.name: Mike Fabert
timelineItems.text: Look good to start this half. Assume Bruce literally tried to kill someone at the half. #LAGalaxy
#VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Juninho.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps need to gain possession and slow the game down #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Robbie Rogers (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: The Orange Futbol
timelineItems.text: Well played, Rodgers. Proving my point. He can do amazing things when he's not focused on marking someone. #lagalaxy #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 49 MIN 'Caps win a free kick after Beitashour is hacked down. The big guns are headed forward... #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Russell Teibert.
Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps FC. Kendall Waston tries a through ball, but Pedro Morales is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Ken
timelineItems.text: Pedro Morales should be banned from taking freekicks...and for that matter shots in general #VWFC

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: The Rogers for Vayrynen sub was a wise one. Now the Galaxy can get some width and Baggio can man the top of the Y #VanvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps FC. Matías Laba tries a through ball, but Nicolás Mezquida is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: 'Caps have had two shots on target in the game: both of which have been 'meat & drink' for Penedo... #VANvLA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Meego
timelineItems.text: Some action at the #whitecaps game #vwfc

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: Meanwhile, Meyer is continuing to quietly have a very good game. #VanvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 56' VANCOUVER GOAL! Manneh had been giving the #LAGalaxy fits early and now he gets a goal after getting past Meyer and Penedo.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: A great ball from Pedro to set the fleet-footed winger in on goal. 'Caps lead this 1-0 #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.desc: Sam Adekugbe (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Sam Adekugbe booked for a late tactical foul

timelineItems.name: Steve Pandher
timelineItems.text: Kekuta with the goal to give Caps 1-0 lead over LA. Don't worry Momma Manneh, celebration was for Jordan Harvey. #VanvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Sam Adekugbe (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).
Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: That sequence was peak Whitecaps: a speedy counter sparked by some Morales magic. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: 56' VAN 1-0: Teibert picks off a poor square pass. Morales plays Manneh behind. Manneh cuts inside and shoots through Penedo. #MLS #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Danielle
timelineItems.text: Now that's what I call using your head, DLG! #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Demmi Skierka
timelineItems.text: Soccer and stuffâ½ï¸ #gowhitecaps! #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps FC
timelineItems.text: GOOOAAALLL! First of the year for Kekuta Manneh!! #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Todd Dunivant (LA Galaxy).
Raúl Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Douglas Miguel
timelineItems.text: Second half #winning #goal #VWFC #WhitecapsFC #Vancouver #MLS #Canada #football #futbol #futebol #pic #photo #soccer  @mls @whitecapsfc @bcplacestadium

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy improvement after halftime actually helps Whitecaps because it allows them to set up the counter more effectively. #MLS #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 61' Deserved lead for #VWFC who have been in control since the outset. Manneh's speed really stretching the Galaxy defense.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: I hate floated balls to space soooooo much. Find a target and pick them out. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Planet Mischief
timelineItems.text: tommy Meyer looking lost out there. Come on #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 64' Edson Buddle entering the match replacing Todd Dunivant. Robbie Rogers slides back to LB and Zardez goes wide left. #VANvLA

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Vancouver Whitecaps FC 2, LA Galaxy 0. Raul Octavio Rivero (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the center of the box.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Octavio Rivero adds another with a tap in finish

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: Very interesting he's going for Buddle over Gordon. I guess it's for link up play? It's a head scratcher but I'm not against it. #VanvLA

timelineItems.name: Simon Fudge
timelineItems.text: Galaxy head coach Bruce Arena adds top his attack with his 2nd sub. Buddle replaces Dunivant. He partners Keane up front. #VANvLA #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Edson Buddle tries to go low but can't beat Ousted

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: think it's a hard decision once Rosales is healthy to put him in and take Mezquida out - Nicolas has been terrific #VANvLA #MLS #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Matthew Doyle
timelineItems.text: Rivero's going to win the Golden Boot. #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Great spin off by Rivero to get open. Is way more then a goal scorer. Great without having the ball also #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Tyler Stychyshyn
timelineItems.text: GOAAAAAL! 2-0 caps Riverio with his 4th of the year already. #whitecapsfc #vanvla #bcplace #vancity #bc #britishcolumbia #canada #vwfc #lag #galaxy #lagalaxy #mls #majorleaguesoccer
Sorry instagram youte being footballed. #whitecaps #football #soccer #lagalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Edson Buddle (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Hoops schmoops, I'm locked in for #VANvLA - big one at BC Place as a solid-looking Whitecaps squad tries to claim their biggest scalp yet.

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: 7 MIN 'Caps stroking the ball around nicely in these early stages. #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Steve Pandher
timelineItems.text: Another positive about the two goals is the added gear it seems to have given Pedro Morales. #VanvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Let's make that four in five for Octavio Rivero. @WhitecapsFC up 2-0. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Next week Caps will be even better with Techera here and Rosales back healthy.#vwfc

timelineItems.name: Ryan Tolmich
timelineItems.text: Rivero proving to be a true poacher. Always in the right place at the right time. Been spectacular so far this season #VWFC
Second goal #VWFC #Whitecaps

timelineItems.name: Challengers Podcast
timelineItems.text: Aside: Manneh might be the breakout player & Rivero might be the big signing, but IMO Mezquida is the sneaky-good secret weapon on #VWFC -W

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Vancouver Whitecaps FC 1, LA Galaxy 0. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Kekuta Manneh slots home the opener for the Caps

timelineItems.name: Russell Arbuthnot
timelineItems.text: Rivero's work rate is exceptional. Fantastic to watch & fully deserving of his strong start in MLS. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kekuta Manneh.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: Galaxy resorting to long ball after 70 minutes of total inability to build anything out of the midfield. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Wes Brown
timelineItems.text: This has got to be the strongest lineup I've ever seen from Vancouver. And Mezquida is such an underrated player. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Marco D'Onofrio
timelineItems.text: #VWFC on the verge of winning their 4th consecutive match since dropping the opener to #TFC. #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Omar González (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: The Orange Futbol
timelineItems.text: How many times must I say the same thing? Zardes must be fed. He does not create his own opportunities. Feed him! #LAGalaxy #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Morales, Manneh and Rivero are looking like the 2013 trio of Camilo, Teibert and Miller #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Russell Teibert (Vancouver Whitecaps FC).

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: Tough call on Man of the Match today. #VWFC have good defensive performances from Laba and Teibert and Mezquida's been good.

timelineItems.name: Astroheader
timelineItems.text: Kekuta Manneh needs wisdom desperately. So many immature decisions. #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps FC
timelineItems.text: GOOOAAALLLL!!!! Octavio Rivero! #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Sam Adekugbe (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Marg Hernandez
timelineItems.text: Most encouraging & exciting game from the @WhitecapsFC so far this season. Against @LAGalaxy at that. Pedro's magic is back. #VANvLA #VWFC
At our first #whitecapsFC game, celebrating their second goal against #lagalaxy #soccer #sports #vancouver #crazyenergy #awesomeseats #gowhiteandblue

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Nicolás Mezquida.

timelineItems.name: Aaron Campbell
timelineItems.text: Nice try by Manneh. Needs a little more power #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Eighty Six Forever
timelineItems.text: Manneh mishits the ball, but like the confidence to take a shot from distance #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Kendall Waston.

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Mikula
timelineItems.text: This Vancouver side is looking pretty legit in the early part of the season. Rivero has been a class signing. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Pace for dayyys. @kekuta16 slips into the final third and opens the scoring for @WhitecapsFC: http://t.co/lORv42jNxU #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: david soto
timelineItems.text: This is just Bruce Arena making a how not to play this season tape for training that's all #lagalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (LA Galaxy) header from the center of the box is just a bit too high.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Edson Buddle puts a header off the top netting

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki has been so poor last few games. Not good. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: AJ never ceases to amaze me. What a stop! Especially given the mood. #VANvLA

timelineItems.desc: Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Gyasi Zardes gets booked for a flailing hand

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (LA Galaxy) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Stefan Ishizaki with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Larry Wong
timelineItems.text: I'm really excited about Flores. He's like a little bundle of energy on the pitch. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Yellow card for Zardes, or Zardez as his jersey says tonight. #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Gyasi Zardes (LA Galaxy).
Deybi Flores (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Steven Beitashour (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jaime Penedo stones Erik Hurtado on the break

timelineItems.name: LAG Confidential
timelineItems.text: Buddle is killing it. Too bad he'll never unseat Zardes despite the fact that the offense arguably fits him better than Zardes. #VanvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Erik Hurtado (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps FC. Conceded by Jaime Penedo.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Darren Mattocks blast is saved by Penedo

timelineItems.name: Jon
timelineItems.text: I give Rogers props for at least still trying and flying up the wing. #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Russell Teibert.

timelineItems.name: Glen VW
timelineItems.text: Losing two solid midfielders during off-season really shows, not a great start to the season. #VANvLA

timelineItems.name: Marg Hernandez
timelineItems.text: Dang. We are attacking relentlessly. #VWFC #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Deybi Flores (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Kendall Waston (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Edson Buddle (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: American Soccer Fan
timelineItems.text: Wow, Hurtado made his presence known immediately. #VANvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Pedro Morales can't finish past a diving Penedo

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: LA were more dangerous last week. Without Keane or Zardes. Not that it’s their fault but sheesh this is a bad look. #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Steven Beitashour.

timelineItems.name: Greg
timelineItems.text: Ever single player on the pitch tonight has put in an excellent night. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Julie Jenkins
timelineItems.text: It's a good night for some football #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Andrew Schmidt
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki’s playing legit bad at this point. Probably all y’all’s angry tweets throwing him off. #VANvLA

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Sam Adekugbe.

timelineItems.name: Layner
timelineItems.text: Love watching Russell Teibert play. The kid simply never quits @WhitecapsFC #workhorse #MLS #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Paul Wilson
timelineItems.text: No snark - this has been one of the worst performances I've seen in a long time. Completely dominated from the beginning. #VANvLA #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Offside, LA Galaxy. Robbie Rogers tries a through ball, but Alan Gordon is caught offside.
Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Pa Modou Kah.

timelineItems.name: Eighty Six Forever
timelineItems.text: So we all agree that Teibert is the Man of the Match, yeah? #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Foul by A.J. DeLaGarza (LA Galaxy).
Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.text: #vancouverwhitecaps VS #LAgalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps FC 2, LA Galaxy 0.
